text: Rabindra Prasad Adhikari (; 4 June 1969 – 27 February 2019) was a Nepalese politician who was a member of the Communist Party of Nepal. He was Minister of Culture, Tourism and Civil Aviation from 16 March 2018 until his death on 27 February 2019. He was born in Bharat Pokhari, Nepal. Adhikari died in a helicopter crash which killed six other people while returning from Pathibhara Devi Temple, Taplejung, Nepal, on 27 February 2019. He was aged 49. == References == Category:1969 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Aviation deaths Category:Communist Party of Nepal (Unified Marxist–Leninist) politicians
title: Rabindra Prasad Adhikari
